Quit
@-22>
Zoom out slow.
@-22>>
Zoom out fast.
@-28>>
Zoom in fast.
@-28>
Zoom in slow.

Histograms are Unlinked
Adjust overlay opacity (blend between image and overlay).

Control Panel
 Image
Zoom
Zoom in/out on the image.
Overlay Alpha
Adjust the opacity of the overlay image.
Image
Image: 
Min Value
Select intensity window minimum.
Max Value
Select intensity window maximum.
Red
Adjust image red channel.
Green
Adjust image green channel.
Blue
Adjust image blue channel.
Histogram
View/adjust the image histogram.
->
Apply image window settings to overlay.
Overlay
Min Value
Select intensity window minimum.
Max Value
Select intensity window maximum..
Red
Adjust overlay red channel.
Green
Adjust overlay green channel.
Blue
Adjust overlay blue channel.
Histogram
View/adjust the overlay histogram.
<-
Apply overlay window settings to image.

Load An Image
Unload
Unload the selected image.
Save

Image: 
Info

Surface
Image 
Load BYU
Load a surface and attach to selected image.
Save
Save the selected surface.
Info
Unload
Remove a surface from the selected image.
Load Anastruct
Load a surface and attach to selected image.
ROI
Fill Opacity
Adjust opacity of ROI.
Visible
Toggle view ROI.
Locked
Toggle lock ROI.
Initialize
Set ROI to center third of image.
Extract Image ROI
Extract the ROI as an image and add it to the image list.

Registration
Translate
Compute translation between image and overlay, apply to overlay, resample into space of the image.
Last translation result :
X
Y
Z
Resample
Resample the overlay into the space of the image.
Apply Translation
Apply user specified translation to the overlay, resample into space of the image.
Align Centroids
Translate the overlay by the centroid difference and resample into space of the image.
Translation
Actions For Fluid Warping:
Create O->I Image
Warp overlay into space of image, add as new image..
Create O->I Surfaces
Warp overlay surfaces into space of image.
Add I->O Surfaces
Warp image surfaces into space of overlay, add to overlay surface list.
Fluid
Compute fluid warp between image and overlay.
Apply h Field
Apply user specified h field (fluid warp).
Fluid Warp
     Use ROI
Use ROI for registration computation.
Rotate
Compute translation between image and overlay, apply to overlay, resample into space of the image.
Rotation
Down sample test
downsample by 
Compute translation between image and overlay, apply to overlay, resample into space of the image.
downsize by 
Compute translation between image and overlay, apply to overlay, resample into space of the image.
